title: Problem solving & decision making
creator_credit: Leslie Hill and Coastline Community College
brief_description: This film examines the question, how do human beings make decisions and solve problems. It identifies and explains the two types of reasoning which have been identified as deduction anf induction. The differences between decision making and problem solving are defined as is the effect of bias. Some of the applications of improved understanding of these processes are identified.
